text:
Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo (; born William Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo; 29 March 1944) is a Ghanaian politician. He is the President of Ghana, in office since January 2017. He served as Attorney General from 2001 to 2003 and as Minister for Foreign Affairs from 2003 to 2007.
In 2020, Akufo-Addo was re-elected beating former President John Mahama.
